attributes.action: legislate to prevent unelected NGOs from formulating and directing British foreign policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unelected groups such as the Royal Institute for International Affairs, The Bilderberg Group and Common Purpose have far too prominent a role in determining foreign policy.
We would ask the Prime Minister to issue a statement explaining why this government feels that it can defer it's elected responsibilities to unelected groups that openly represent private corporate interests and do not serve the interests of the British electorate.

rejection.details: The claim that the Government defers its elected responsibilities is unsubstantiated.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
